introduction: History By The Numbers is an energetic, fast-paced series that takes a global dive into the extraordinary and often overlooked numbers that have created our world's history.Each episode delves into the numbers and over-the-top stats behind a different subject such as the massive growth of the global fast food empire, the wealth and bloodshed of the world's top crime bosses, the herculean numbers behind Mount Everest, and the lives of the richest people on earth.Episodes include…S01E01	4 Trillion French FriesS01E02	EverestS01E03	Queens for LifeS01E04	Crime BossesS01E05	Crazy Rich PeopleS01E06	The Roaring 20sS01E07	PsychedelicsS01E08	HeistsS01E09	King TutS01E10	Race to BerlinS01E11	The Gender GapS01E12	The AmazonS01E13	InfidelityS01E14	Party AnimalsS01E15	SkyscrapersS01E16	Air TravelS01E17	AstronautsS01E18	Cats & DogsS01E19	Genghis KahnS01E20	The Great Migration
